law.text: The Kentucky Infrastructure Authority shall be attached to the Department for Local Government for administrative purposes. Office space required by the authority shall be provided by the Department for Local Government.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 2, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 49, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 396, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295, sec. 19, effective July 15, 1980.
